channel.description: Recent content in hardware on goshSAMit

item.title: Home Lab Hardware
item.description: My home lab came about from asking the question “how am I supposed to get an IT job that requires experience, without experience?” On top of new responsibilities at my current role, my home lab is a great place to practice, learn, try new things, and fail, all without worry about taking down production. I figure my hardware is a good place to start. I’ll make a list of all the hardware and what I am doing with it or what I plan to do with it.
